title: Community Setup Wizard
name: Community Setup Wizard
story: As a facilitator, I want to create a community hub with conversation topics and invite members
description: Multi-step wizard for creating a community with purpose, guidelines, members, and AI facilitator

triggers.given: A user initiates the community creation workflow
triggers.when: The user clicks 'New Community' and their institution type uses COMMUNITY-SETUP-001
triggers.then: The wizard steps are loaded from this spec and the flow progresses through all steps
triggers.name: Community Setup Wizard Execution

parameters.name: Wizard Step Definitions
parameters.description: Defines the sequence and configuration of community setup wizard steps

steps.label: Purpose
steps.description: Define community name, theme, and goals

steps.label: Guidelines
steps.description: Set conversation norms and community guidelines

steps.label: Members
steps.description: Invite members or share a join link

steps.label: AI Facilitator
steps.description: Customize the AI facilitator persona and welcome message

steps.label: Launch
steps.description: Create the community hub and complete setup
